["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["这是除了 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/debian-cd/","children":"Debian CD"}]," 之外 Debian 的另一部分补充用官方和准官方安装镜像的副本。
其内容来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://cdimage.debian.org/cdimage/","rel":"nofollow","children":"http://cdimage.debian.org/cdimage/"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"部分镜像站并未进行完整的同步，保留了较实用的一部分内容。"}],"
